description: Lint cleanup to zero errors and production build fix for ffmpeg WASM asset handling.

changes.description: Fix production build stall caused by Rollup attempting to transform 31 MB ffmpeg WASM binary
changes.details: Replaced new URL('@ffmpeg/core/wasm', import.meta.url) pattern with static ?url imports so Vite copies the WASM as a static asset instead of running it through the transform pipeline.

changes.description: Lint cleanup: zero ESLint errors, tailwind ESM import, gitignore additions
changes.details: Downgraded no-explicit-any to warning. Fixed block-scoping, empty catches, interface-to-type alias, escape, and const issues across researcher components and UI primitives.
